algorithm

类 MF2DBooleanIncrementalGLG

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithm.UserBasedThreeWayRecommender
      • algorithm.MF2DBoolean
        • algorithm.MF2DBooleanIncremental
          • algorithm.MF2DBooleanIncrementalGLG

  • public class MF2DBooleanIncrementalGLG
extends MF2DBooleanIncremental
    Incremental learning for matrix factorization with GL transformation
    Project: Three-way conversational recommendation.
    版本:
    1.0
    作者:
    Fan Min
    www.fansmale.com, github.com/fansmale/TCR.
    Email: minfan@swpu.edu.cn, minfanphd@163.com.

      • predictForUser

        public double[] predictForUser(int paraUser)
        Predict the ratings of the user to each item. Attention: ONLY this method should be overwritten to enable GL transform.
        覆盖:
        predictForUser 在类中 MF2DBoolean
        参数:
        paraUser - The user index.
